remarks: The case when the content of ` ph ` is identical with the content of ` ps ` and in which a proposition controlled by an element for which we substitute the content of ` ph ` is affirmed ( in this specific case the identity logical funtion ) and the same proposition, this time where we subsituted the content of ` ps ` , is denied does not take place.  Part of Axiom 52 of [Frege1879] p. 50.  (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: ax-frege52a $p |- ( ( ph <-> ps ) -> ( if- ( ph , th , ch ) -> if- ( ps , th , ch ) ) ) $.
